page.title: 15LOCAL SERVICES
page.content:
In Gullane there is a surgery with two doctors.The doctors serve the needs of Gullane,Dirleton and Aberlady.The surgery hours are 08.30to09.30 and 17.30to18.30.The rest of the day they are on call.Their house calls vary from 10-25 a day.Between the two doctors there are 4000 patients.The village has one chemist to deal with prescriptions.According to the doctors the most common complaints amongst children are coughs and sneezes.
In Gullane there is a library situated in the old school.Two librarians are employed to take care of 10,000 books. The library is open 14 hours per week.
The old school also houses a weekly baby clinic.
